Circuit Glow offers a sleek, high-tech interface featuring a glowing circuit board background illuminated with bright blue accents. Perfect for technology enthusiasts and fans of futuristic minimalism, this extension enhances focus and productivity with its clean and visually striking design. The intricate details of the circuit board bring a modern and dynamic touch to your browsing experience.
Key Features:
- Custom Shortcuts
- Real-Time Clock
- Live Weather Updates
